Record.ClassificationPath: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Abortion, Spontaneous/Abortion, Threatened
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: UTERINE BLEEDING from a GESTATION of less than 20 weeks without any CERVICAL DILATATION. It is characterized by vaginal bleeding, lower back discomfort, or midline pelvic cramping and a risk factor for MISCARRIAGE.
